attributes.action: Remove Jeremy Hunt from his position as Health secretary
attributes.additional_details: Jeremy hunt has no medical background, he doesn't understand how hospitals operate or what being a junior doctor entails therefore he is not qualified to make decisions on medical issues/jobs/patient priorities. Having never worked in a hospital he has no experience or knowledge of what's required for patients or staff and therefore should be replaced by someone with the required experience who is not a member of parliament and therefore cannot be influenced by unknowledgable MPs
attributes.background: Jeremy hunt must be removed from his position as health secretary and replaced by a senior doctor with multiple years experience within the NHS, who will be voted in by existing members/employees of the NHS who will put staff and patients first. The elected person should be a member of parliament

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments. If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
